title: Kelsey S. (Verified ZocDoc User)'s Review of Dr. Jennifer Reyes - DDS (5/5) on ZocDoc
text: Bedside Manner Wait Time Dr Reyes really puts you at ease, which is nice because sometimes our fear gets the better of us when we visit the dentist. She just makes it seem like a pleasant place, is very professional, and left me feeling like my teeth hadn't been cleaner in years. Her new office on 57th Street isn't fussy but is packed with state-of-the-art equipment that just made everything easy. I especially liked the digital x-rays. Highly recommended for anyone who wants a trustworthy dentist who is experienced but also up to date. Review
